title: Granite kitchen countertops, Storage spaces available for rent
posting_body: ['The Douglas', '2300 Walnut Street, Denver, CO, 80205', 'Need more information?', 'Copy this link:', '<URL>', 'Call Now:', 'show contact info', 'WHERE LUXURY MEETS ELEGANCE', 'This is a 1 Bedroom, 1 Bath, approximately 634 Sq.', 'Ft.', 'Welcome home, to a Denver location that’s centered on convenience, connection, and YOU!', 'At The Douglas Apartments, you’re living in the heart of the city and the center of all that Downtown Denver has to offer as the city’s most desirable address.', 'Located just minutes away from catching a baseball game at Coors Field, or epic nightlife and dining in neighboring Union Station and RiNo Districts.', 'Inside The Douglas, living is easy in spacious studio, 1 and 2 bedroom apartments with all the luxury amenities you need to elevate your lifestyle.', 'From designer kitchens made to impress, to spacious closets with ample space to spread out and settle in – you’ll find just what you’ve been looking for at The Douglas.', 'Did we mention the views?', 'Our apartments have stunning mountain or vibrant city views that make you appreciate all the beauty that is Denver.', 'Welcome to where luxury meets elegance.', 'Welcome home to The Douglas.', 'Features', '- Tile kitchen backsplash', '- Granite kitchen countertops', '- Patios and balconies with vibrant courtyard or mountain views*', '- Energy Star appliances*', '- Refrigerator with in-door ice and water dispenser', '- Ceiling fans in bedrooms*', '- Stainless-steel kitchen appliances*', '- Large walk-in closets*', '- Dual sink vanities*', '- Central air with energy efficient programmable thermostat', '- Front loading washer and dryer', '- Concrete flooring or wood-look plank flooring*', '- Built-in microwaves', '*In select apartment homes', 'Community Amenities', '- Fitness studio with Yoga room and free weights', '- Outdoor BBQ and picnic area', '- Storage spaces available for rent', '- Controlled access building with elevators and garage parking', '- Minutes from Coors Field', '- Shimmering resort-style saltwater pool with spa', '- Co-working lounge with Wi-Fi access', '- Bicycle storage and ski repair area', '- Courtyard with fireplace and fire pit', '- Pet friendly with dog spa and rooftop pet park (Breed restrictions apply)', '- Virtual Moving Concierge', '- Share the Air: smoke-free community', '- Spacious clubroom with kitchen, bar area, television and sitting area, and billiards', '- Easy access to RTD and B-Cycle stations', '- Rooftop lounge with fireplace, grill, and expansive city views', 'Office Hours', 'Monday-Tuesday:10:00AM-6:00PM', 'Wednesday: 11:00AM - 6:00PM', 'Thursday-Friday:10:00AM-6:00PM', 'Saturday:10:00AM-5:00PM', 'Sunday: CLOSED', 'While we are open for self-guided, virtual and in-person tours, they are by appointment only.', 'Please call us or schedule a tour on our website to visit the property in person.', 'Pet Policy', "We're pet friendly!", 'See our website for details.', 'Photos on this ad may not reflect all floorplans.', 'Advertised pricing and availability are subject to change without notice and cannot be guaranteed.', 'Photos on this ad may not reflect all floorplans.',
